message.entry: Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
ConnectionChangedFcn must be a function handle.
Failed to write from the server. A TCP/IP client must be connected to the server.
Saving tcpserver objects to a MAT-file is not supported.
Loading tcpserver objects from a MAT-file is not supported.
Invalid number of input arguments for 'tcpserver'. Valid syntaxes are\n{0}
Invalid address or hostname was specified.
Port number must be a positive double that is less than 2^16.
Max connections must be greater than zero.
